DOC.brief_title: Phase I / II Study Irinotecan ( CPT-11 ) Combined With l-Leucovorin ( l-LV ) 5-FU Patients With Advanced Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter Open-label , single-arm , phase I/II clinical trial conduct patient histological stage IV colorectal cancer give irinotecan , leucovorin plus fluorouracil . The usefulness regimens 1st line therapy colorectal cancer evaluate disease-free survival rate ( DFR ) , median survival time ( MST ) , incidence severity adverse event .
